component.name: RunManager
component.selected: ScalaTest.UserStorageSpec.User Storage should Start with disconnected state and empty data User Storage should be connected state if it receive a connect message User Storage should be still in disconnected state if it receive any other messages User Storage should be switch to disconnected when it receive a disconnect message on Connected state User Storage should be still on connected state if it receive any DB operations
